about_the_game:
Welcome to our latest experiment called Monkey Split, a game being developed alongside our community on Discord and here on Steam. Thanks to everyone's comments, playtests, reports, suggestions, and ideas, we are slowly moulding this game into... something. What will be the end result? We aren't fully sure, but one thing is certain, it will be a game.

And now it's time for a completely different description:

You're now a monkey*, the room is full of stuff*, collect the stuff in the cardboard box while running away from the possessed monkey. EASY! Don't get caught!
And if you're the one possessed, catch every monkey and explode them into the Bananaverse*.



This game has*:
- Procedural generated maps;
- Lots of custom items for your monkey*;
- 30% more potassium*;

You should*:
- Have fun*;
- Ignore all the bugs*;
- Don't take anything here too seriously*;

You shouldn't:
- Not report the bugs**;
- Climb/Walk on the walls, you could get hurt***;
- Spank the monkey****;

Monkey Split features fast rounds, slow rounds, all the rounds and none of the rounds! ROUNDS!

Additional notes:
* Our code monkeys are still developing this game, so it may or may not include what was listed above and it may or may not work as planned;
** Please fill in the online form BS-85 respective to the Lisbon Monkey Accord of 1992;
*** This is not a threat;
**** Please don't*****;
***** Please stop with the asterisks**!;
detailed_description:
Welcome to our latest experiment called Monkey Split, a game being developed alongside our community on Discord and here on Steam. Thanks to everyone's comments, playtests, reports, suggestions, and ideas, we are slowly moulding this game into... something. What will be the end result? We aren't fully sure, but one thing is certain, it will be a game.

And now it's time for a completely different description:

You're now a monkey*, the room is full of stuff*, collect the stuff in the cardboard box while running away from the possessed monkey. EASY! Don't get caught!
And if you're the one possessed, catch every monkey and explode them into the Bananaverse*.



This game has*:
- Procedural generated maps;
- Lots of custom items for your monkey*;
- 30% more potassium*;

You should*:
- Have fun*;
- Ignore all the bugs*;
- Don't take anything here too seriously*;

You shouldn't:
- Not report the bugs**;
- Climb/Walk on the walls, you could get hurt***;
- Spank the monkey****;

Monkey Split features fast rounds, slow rounds, all the rounds and none of the rounds! ROUNDS!

Additional notes:
* Our code monkeys are still developing this game, so it may or may not include what was listed above and it may or may not work as planned;
** Please fill in the online form BS-85 respective to the Lisbon Monkey Accord of 1992;
*** This is not a threat;
**** Please don't*****;
***** Please stop with the asterisks**!;

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Sierra 10.12
  • Processor: 2.0GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon Pro 460
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mojave 10.14
  • Processor: 2.4GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 5000 Series
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

name: Monkey Split

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8.1/10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel i3 4370 / AMD FX 8370
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 670 / AMD R9 280
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8.1/10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel i5 6600 / Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 / AMD RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system.

reviews:
“Won 2020 GOTY (Game Or Total Yesn't), the greatest WGW award that is most definitely a real thing.”
10/10 – Worst Games Weekly
